title: Episode 359: Blood, Sweat, & Poles (Feat. Brandee Evans & Nicco Annan)
itunes:title: Episode 359: Blood, Sweat, & Poles (Feat. Brandee Evans & Nicco Annan)
description:
Actors, Brandee Evans and Nicco Annan join the ladies of Lip Service this week to promote Season 2 of the hit show, "P-Valley!" The crew discuss their favorite moments from this show thus far, the amount of work that goes into mastering a pole routine, strip club etiquette, and much more. Gigi even has a VERY SPECIAL announcement regarding season 2! Make sure to check out P-Valley on STARZ. Enjoy!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
